full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'PHAGS PA TSE DANG YE SHES DPAG TU MED PA ZHES BYA BA THEG PA CHEN PO'I MDO BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @017B (BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS 'DI SKAD CES BKA' STZAL NAS, 'JAM DPAL GZHON NUR GYUR BA DANG, THAMS CAD DANG LDAN PA'I 'KHOR DE DAG DANG, LHA DANG, MI DANG, LHA MA YIN DANG, DRI ZAR BCAS PA'I 'JIG RTEN YI RANGS TE, BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS GSUNGS PA LA MNGON PAR BSTOD DO, ,'PHAGS PA TSE DANG YE SHES DPAG TU MED PA ZHES BYA BA THEG PA CHEN PO'I MDO RDZOGS SO,, ,,SA SKYONG 'KHOR DANG BCAS RNAMS KYI, ,TSE 'DIR BSAM @018A *, ,PA'I DON GRUB CING, BAR CHAD SEL NAS BKRA SHIS PA, ,BSAM PA CHOS BZHIN 'GRUB PAR SHOG , ,'DOD DGU'I 'BYOR PA DBYAR GYI MTSO LTAR 'PHEL, ,SKYON MED RIGS KYIS DAL 'GRO RGYUN CHAD MED, ,NYIN MTSAN BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I CHOS KYIS 'DA', ,PHUN TSOGS DPAL LA ROL PA'I BKRA SHIS SHOG , ,,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,DGE'O, ,LEGS SO,, ,,)
